title: Integrated Program for Self-Regulated Learning and Engagement Enhancement for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Education combining the jigsaw teaching method with self-regulated learning strategies via mobile apps executed on digital devices, providing a platform for collaborative learning and self-directed learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to analyze nursing topics and present them with over 80% accuracy using the jigsaw cooperative learning model
Learners improve learning efficiency by over 30% by applying self-regulated learning strategies (goal setting, time management, self-assessment) to real learning situations
Learners achieve a collaboration participation score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in peer and self-evaluations through mobile-based project implementation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
